sections.purpose: To collect urine, feces, and sometimes expired air separately for metabolic studies.
sections.scope: Applicable to pharmacokinetic and toxicological evaluations.
procedure: Assemble the cage ensuring separation of urine and feces collection funnels.
Place the animal in the cage with free access to food and water unless restricted.
Collect excreta at specified time intervals.
Measure volume/weight and store samples appropriately.
Clean and disinfect the cage thoroughly after each use.
precautions: Avoid overcrowding; one animal per cage.
Monitor animals frequently for signs of distress.
Ensure proper alignment of collection funnels to avoid cross-contamination.
